description: Helper cascade that fires a signal after a brief delay. Used by signal_roundtrip_demo.json

phases.name: prepare
phases.instructions: Say 'Preparing to fire signal in a moment...' This brief pause ensures the consumer has time to register its wait.

phases.name: fire
phases.instructions: Use fire_signal to fire a signal named 'roundtrip_demo' with this payload: {"source": "async_producer", "message": "Hello from the async producer!", "timestamp": "now"}
